A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: When I first heard Disney had bought Lucasfilm I was overjoyed. We were finally going to get new Star Wars films again! We are going to see where our heroes had gone. But instead of giving us our heros with valor\, dignity\, and honor. they tore our hero's apart and made them failures. And for what? To make room for Mary Sue? Good grief. They gave us a Han that leaves Leah and is killed by his dark son and a  broken Luke that isn't even willing to fight for good anymore. One that literally dies because he won't leave his island to defend his friends. My heroes have been massively disrespected.  It's a broken hearted time for Star Wars fans.
